page.description: Gets the names of all groups that a user is a member of. Returns a crlf delimited list.

argument.name: User_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of defined users.

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: Optional. If you are not logged in as the administrator, you must supply the administrator password.

page.discussion: The A5_GET_USERS function returns a CR-LF delimited list of all defined users.
page.example: ? a5_get_users() = Tom Dick Harry Mary Bob John
